name: Ultimate Street Fight Hero
description:
Remember the childhood classic played in arcade action game? Have you ever played any real superheroes fighting? Are you a fan of Super Hero Adventure games? If yes then get ready to play the best Ultimate Street Fight Hero game of 2018.

Ultimate Street Fight Hero Game Play:

Game will bring your mission after mission.
Use different Weapons like Knife, Base bat and Many other weapons.
Power up your Health by clicking button on Screen.
Clear the mission will help to compete next level.
creates a different every time for hours of radioactive boss hero fun!
After every crude ninja waves your final target to Ultimate Street Fight Hero.
Become the real world guardian of kung fu.
Use your super future powers to beat your futuristic superheroes enemies.

Ultimate Street Fight Hero Features:

Detailed environments with different Views.
Highly futuristic incredible superheroes in Ultimate Street Fight Hero.
Learn you to perfect martial arts and kung Fu karate.
Stunning gameplay with variety of superhero levels.
Realistic fighting sound effects.
Futuristic HD 3D Graphics.
Smooth fighters’ animations and fighting styles.

Fight of guardian Champions hero continues! Join the new iteration of combat of street hero fighting champions! Next generation of warrior has arrived-check their glory! Kung Fu hero champions fight is the action game of fighting, enter the world of king of fighting and overcome your rivals dead or alive. Challenge the ultimate Kung Fu fighters, try different fighting styles, punch in all enemies, and kick out all other fighters.
Your enemies use different fighting styles including Taekwondo, Muay Thai, Kung Fu, Boxing and other, so do your best to overcome all of them with the power of Cadillacs karate style! Level up your fighting skills with each level and become the guardian of city!
Become the strongest Cadillacs fighter on the earth playing Real Superhero mafia Ultimate Street Fight Hero Fighting 3D & action game! Explore different locations fighting for your life and survive on the street ring leaving your opponent no chance to stay alive! Earn points for each killed enemy, fight against powerful rivals and up level your boxing skills to the top level! Prove your worth as the powerful Cadillacs fighter & killing boss with Superhero Ultimate Street Fight Hero fighting 3D!

Gangsters are active, crime rate is high, city people are in danger and criminal activities are at its peak. Army is busy in war, police can’t handle it alone. Survival of innocent people is extreme difficult. People are trembling and you save them by using the super strange powers of Boxing & Fighting 2017 and become the guardian of people.
Fighting against the incredible superheroes like green beast hero, incredible clown and other futuristic superheroes is not a big deal in hero city if you are master of kung fu and Boxing & other fighting skills.

San Andreas Street Boss Fighting, Ultimate Street Fight Hero is a classic free arcade fighting game. King of Boss fighter brings the original fighting experience. Fun and addictive challenging game with realistic physics and hardcore ninja gameplay. With simple controls you can perform amazing stunts and blows to defeat your opponents as killing boss in slow motion.

While playing this killing game, step into the arena with Champion Fighting, No. 1 full contact combat fighting experience with 3D jaw dropping graphics. Prepare for epic versus fighting action, tap as quickly as possible to perform combos and build your power to pull off special attacks against your opponents along with your killing boss.

WE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK:
